name: Jigsaw Masterpieces : Beautiful Sceneries in the USA
detailed_description:
"Jigsaw Masterpieces : Beautiful Sceneries in the USA" is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

PACK INFO:

Puzzle Count: 10 Puzzles

PACK CONTENTS:

  • Golden Gate Bridge, San Francisco, California
  • The Historic Alamo, San Antonio, Texas
  • Statue of Liberty, Manhattan, New York
  • Fort Lauderdale, Miami, Florida
  • Sunset Times in Chicago, Illinois
  • Independence Hall, Philadelphia, Pennsylvania
  • Dawn of Cincinnati, Ohio
  • Pictured Rocks National Lakeshore, Michigan
  • Georgia State Capitol
  • Brook in Stone Mountain, North Carolina
